list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a warm bed covering made of padding enclosed between layers of fabric and kept in place by lines of stitching, typically applied in a decorative design.
join together (layers of fabric or padding) with lines of stitching to form a warm bed covering or garment, or for decorative effect.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we quilted the covers with parallel lines of stitching
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi quilted the cover với các đường khâu song song
